directions: Stir water and baking powder together in a bowl (mixture should foam). Mix turkey, flour, egg, salt, and black pepper into water and baking powder. Form mixture into bite-size nuggets.
Heat vegetable oil in a skillet over medium heat. Fry the nuggets in the hot vegetable oil until golden brown, 5 to 8 minutes per side.
ingredients: 1 pinch salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 tablespoon vegetable oil, or as needed
title: Turkey Nuggets (or Chicken)
